pageProduct.name: Thankyou Conditioner Bar with Chamomile & Rosewater 70g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

To help nourish and protect your hair we’ve put the good stuff into this plant-based conditioner bar. Calming chamomile and Australian rosewater will help leave your hair feeling clean and soft. The best part? This bar exists to help end global poverty. MADE WITH LOVE IN AUSTRALIA VEGAN FRIENDLY NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS MADE WITH NO PRODUCT WASTAGE MADE WITH RECYCLED CARDBOARD MADE WITH RECIRCULATED WATER

Warnings

But first, read this Patch test before use. Store below 25°C and in a clean dry place. Keep out of direct sunlight and pooled water. For external use only. Avoid contact with your eyes. If you experience irritation after use, please discontinue.

Common Uses

Conditioner

Ingredients

Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Olive Fruit Oil, Glycerin, Citric Acid, Fragrance, Cocoa Seed Butter, Hydrolysed Jojoba Esters, Chamomile Flower Extract, Rose Flower Water (Organic), Geranium Oil, Patchouli Oil, Coconut Oil (Organic), Shea Butter (Organic), Hydrolysed Oat Protein, Hydrolysed Soy Proteins, Vitamin E, Maltodextrin, Kaolin, Polyquaternium-10, Water.

Directions

The how-to After shampooing, rub this bar between your hands until a smooth cream forms (you won’t need too much, a little goes a long way!), then put bar down and massage into your hair. Leave for 1-2 minutes then rinse it out.
